answer text to this question should appear below it

answer to this question below it

name: FAQ
description:
In order not to bother admins/moderators with freaquently asked question
    Users want to view answers to freaquently asked question

    FAQ should have white "Часті Питання" heading of blue background
    FAQ should have list of freaquently asked questions
    If question was clicked on - answer appears below this question and it becomes red
    If clicked question was clicked again - answer hides and question text becomes again black from red

on green background show question number
question content
user answer
correct answer
information about correct answer
user passed test
program checked user test and certain answer is wrong
on red background show question number
question content
user answer
correct answer

user clicks on button
user directed to pass this certain test again

name: Pass test again button
description:
In order to improve score on this certain test
    Users want to pass this certain test again

steps.name: user passed test
program checked user test
user score shown in format "Твій вислід: <userScore> зі <maxScore> балів!" in green text color
under it, scorebar dynamically fills from left to right showing test score proportionally in green and red colors(correct to wrong)

name: Score
description:
In order to see what score users get on passing test
    Users want to view their score

steps.name: user passed test
program checked user test
on green background test results heading "Тест <testName>" in bold format is shown
category "з категорії <category> підкатегорії <subcategory>" in italic format is shown

name: Test results heading
description:
In order to see what test was passed
    Users want to view test results heading with test name in it
    And view category and subcategory under test name

steps.name: there is a list of three subcategories
I click on one of these subcategories

first subcategory "Баскетбол"

I can pass any test
second subcategory "Хокей"
I click on
I will have a list of 4 tests:
I can pass any test
third subcategory "Футбол"
I click on
I will have a list of 2 tests:
I can pass any test
have a test with three questions and each of them has three possible answers
choose the answer
it turns green
there is a green button under the questions "Пройти тест"
all answers are chosen
the button is onclicked
there will be a result of the test evaluated in 100 points
correct answers will be green
wrong answers will be red
under the answers is a green button to pass the test again

name: Advanced search page
description:
You can search keyword in category that you can choose 
    You can choose more than two categories to search in 
    You don't need to be logged in, it's same search for all users
    I can see all test in category without keyword
    
    Scenarion: General view 
        Given I open advanced search page
        Then I see advanced search page with header
        And name of my user or "Log In" button 
        And site navigation menu 
        And block of category filters with button "Use filter"
        And text input form with "Search" button
        And I see list rectangle
        And in rectangle there is name of test
        And summary about test 
        And in the bottom of rectangular there is tags 
        And under all of rectangulars there is a numbers of pages
        And in the bottom of page i see footer menu

I go to the users Personal cabinet page
I click on "Опубліковані"
I should see the list of my published tests in table:
I sign in as "Tolik"
I go to the users Personal cabinet page
I click on "Недопрацьовані"
I should see the list of my unfinished tests in table:
I sign in as "Tolik"
I go to the users Personal cabinet page
I click on "Незатверджені"
I should see the list of my Unapproved tests in table:
I sign in as "Tolik"
I go to the users Personal cabinet page
I click on "Створені"
I should see the list of all my created tests in table:

name: Personal cabinet
description:
In order to see the status  of my tests
	As a user
	I want to see the list  of my tests

steps.name: I am on the profile of other user
I see the avatar of the user
I see the field "Имя"
I see the field "Станиця"
I see the field "Курінь"
I see the field "Улад"
I see the field "Ступінь"
I see the field "Гурток"
I see the field "Улад"
I see the field "Статус в системі"
I see the field "Історія тестів"
I click on the link "user_statistics"
I will be redirect to the "user_statistics" page

name: Profile of other user
description:
In order to see information about other user
    As a User
    I want to see the profile of other user

steps.name: guest on the "Category" page
I click "Subcategory" link
I get to "Subcategory" page
page's title is "Пошук тестів у Subcategory name"
page contains "Filer field", "Search field", "Page-selector of results "
Filter field contains "Сортування по" and drop-down list
I click drop-down list
I can see two drop-down options
Filter field "Сортування по" and option "Даті"
I click option "Даті"
I can see sort results of subcategory tests sorted by creation date
Filter field "Сортування по" and option "Алфівіту"
I click option "Алфівіту"
I can see sort results of subcategory tests sorted by alphabet
Search field contains input field and search button with loupe pictogram
I input name of sought-for test
click on search button
I can see search results of tests with required name
list of subcategory search results
I see list of search results
I can see list of blocks of subcategory tests contains
Name of subcategory test
I click on link of name of test
I open page where I can take a test
page-selector of results contains <page> buttons
I click <page> button
I can see a <page> of search results
page-selector of results contains <page> buttons
I click <page> button
I can see a <page> of search results
page-selector of results contains <page> buttons
I click <page> button
I can see a <page> of search results
page-selector of results contains <page> buttons
I click <page> button
I can see a <page> of search results
page-selector of results contains <page> buttons
I click <page> button
I can see a <page> of search results

name: Subcategory page with ability to find specific test
description:
As a guest I need to see search results of subcategory tests, 
  	and to be able to find specific test 
  	using search and using alphabet or date filter.

steps.name: I open test creation page
I see test creation page with header
name of my user
site navigation menu
I see name of current page "Test creation"
input form with test name input
test description input
tags input
drop-down list of test category
drop-down list of test subcategory
input form for test question
in the end of input i see "Delete test" button
explanation to test input
answer for test and in the end of input there is "Right answer" button and "Delete answer" button
another answer and in the end of input there is "Right answer" button and "Delete answer" button
"Add Answer" button
"Add question" button
"Save as drafts" button and "Send for the moderation" button
in the bottom of page i see footer menu

elements.name: Sending new test for moderator with filling all fields

steps.name: filled all fields
push button "Send to moderator"
you will be relocated to user cabinet

elements.name: Sending new test for moderator without filling all fields

steps.name: filled not all fields
push button "Send to moderator"
fields that were not filled will have red border

elements.name: Adding new question to the test

steps.name: push button "Add new question"
I see new form for question under old one
push button "Remove test"
I don't see form for question
I push the "Right answer" button on the answer field
I see green checkmark near field
I push "Add answer" button
I see new answer field under the old one
I push "Remove answer" button
that answer is deleted from field

elements.name: Saving test to drafts with filling all fields

steps.name: I fill all fields in the test
I push "Save as draft"
I see my cabinet page

elements.name: Saving test to drafts without filling all fields

steps.name: filled not all fields
I push "Save as draft"
I see my cabinet page

name: Creating of new test page
description:
I can access this page if I logged in as an authorised user
    Test can not been added without fiiling up all forms
    Every question must have at least one answer

steps.name: user passed test
program checked user test
I should see heading "Тест <testName>"
category "з категорії <category> підкатегорії <subcategory>"
I should see score shown in format "Твій вислід: <userScore> зі <maxScore> балів!"
under it, I should see scorebar that dynamically fills from left to right showing test score proportionally in green and red colors(correct to wrong)
I should see list of blocks of correct or wrong answers
I should see "Пройти тест заново!" pass test again button
user passed test
program checked user test and certain answer is correct
I should see on green background question number
question content
user answer
correct answer
information about correct answer
user passed test
program checked user test and certain answer is wrong
I should see on red background question number
question content
user answer
correct answer
information about correct answer

elements.name: User clicks on pass test again button

steps.name: green "Пройти тест заново!" button
I click on pass test again button
I should be directed to pass this certain test again

name: Test results page
description:
In order to learn about test results
As a user I want to view test name, category and subcategory
And I want to view my score
And my correct and wrong answers
And learn information about correct answers

steps.name: guest on the "Home" page
I click "Statistic" link
I get to "Total statistic of the system" page
page's title is "Total statistic of the system"
page contains "Tests", "Scores", "Scores/Age", "Scores/Level", "Amount of tries", "Average score" tabs
page's active tab by default is "Tests"
page contains "From/To" date filter with "Generate chart" button

elements.name: View of passed tests by category and time period chart

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click "Tests" tab
I set date in "From" field
I set date in "To" field
I click "Generate chart" button
I can see a chart of passed tests by category and time period

elements.name: View of overall average score by time period chart

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click "Scores" tab
I set date in "From" field
I set date in "To" field
I click "Generate chart" button
I can see a chart of overall average score by time period

elements.name: View of distribution of scores by age chart

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click "Scores/Age" tab
I set date in "From" field
I set date in "To" field
I filter by age
I click "Generate chart" button
I can see a chart of distribution of scores by age

elements.name: View of distribution of scores by user level chart

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click "Scores/Level" tab
I set date in "From" field
I set date in "To" field
I filter by level
I click "Generate chart" button
I can see a chart of distribution of scores by user level

elements.name: View of top-10 tests by an amount of test tries table

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click "Amount of tries" tab
I can see a table, containing following columns
there are 10 records in the table sorted by "Amount of tries" in descending order

elements.name: View of top-10 tests by average user score table

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click "Average score" tab
I can see a table, containing following columns
there are 10 records in the table sorted by "Average score" in descending order
guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I click on "Chart contex menu" button
I see menu, containing following items
guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I generate passed tests  by category and time period chart
I click on "Chart contex menu" button
I chose "Print chart" item
I see browser's print dialog containing passed tests  by category and time period to be printed
guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I generate overall average score by time period chart
I click on "Chart contex menu" button
I chose "Print chart" item
I see browser's print dialog containing overall average score by time period to be printed
guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I generate distribution of scores by age chart
I click on "Chart contex menu" button
I chose "Print chart" item
I see browser's print dialog containing distribution of scores by age to be printed
guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I generate distribution of scores by user level chart
I click on "Chart contex menu" button
I chose "Print chart" item
I see browser's print dialog containing distribution of scores by user level to be printed

elements.name: Save "passed tests by category and time period" chart

steps.name: guest on the "Total statistic of the system" page
I generate "passed tests by category and time period" chart
I click on "Chart contex menu" button
I select "Download PNG image" menu item
image with PNG image extension is downloaded

name: Total statistic of the system
description:
As a Guest I need to be able to use statistics page to see
  information about passed tests by category and time period,
  overall average score, 
  distribution of scores by age, 
  distribution of scores by user level,
  information about an amount of test tries,
  information about top 10 tests by average user score

elements.name: Registration form to become a user

steps.name: I see a registration form
I fill in all required input fields
I can sign up or return to main page
button for registration "Реєстрація"
I click on this button
I should see a home page
button for registration cancel "Відмінити"
I click on this button
I should see a home page
input field for a name "Ім'я"
I input a name
there should be a name
required input field for a username "Псевдо"
I  input a username
there should be a nickname
required input field for a password "Пароль"
I input a password
there should be correctly entered password
input field for a plast region "Станиця"
I input a name of the plast region
there should be the name of the plast region
input field for plast hovel "Пластовий курінь"
I input a plast hoven
there should be a plast hoven
required input field for birth date "Дата народження"
I input a day of birth or choose it in the calendar
there should be a day of birth
drop-down list of plast degree "Пластовий ступінь"
I choose a degree
there should be a degree I've chosen
drop-down list of groups "Гурток"
I choose a group
there should be a group name
required input field for an e-mail "Е-меіл"
I input an e-mail
there should be correctly entered e-mail

name: User registration
description:
As a Guest I need to be able to use sign up ( registration ) dialog 
    I order to be able to become registered in the system and have my information present there
